subscription.features:
One day, one story
365+ topics to complete
You own your information
subscription.price:
7 days, then only 4.99 USD
per month
subscription.priceAfter:
4.99 USD per month after
FREE 7-day trial
subscription.terms.ios: Yester offers a FREE 7-Day trial with the selection of a subscription option - Monthly plan. When selecting a plan, you will not be charged during the free trial period. If you do not cancel the subscription 24-hours before the current period or free trial is up, the subscription plan will auto-renew and your iTunes Account will be charged. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Please see Apple's auto-renewing subscription details for more information. All of Yester's subscription plans provide FULL access to the above features and ALL future updates. Cancel at anytime. For more information, please see our
subscription.terms.android: Yester offers a FREE 7-Day trial with the selection of a subscription option - Monthly plan. When selecting a plan, you will not be charged during the free trial period. If you do not cancel the subscription 24-hours before the current period or free trial is up, the subscription plan will auto-renew and your Google Play Account will be charged. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Please see Google Play's auto-renewing subscription details for more information. All of Yester's subscription plans provide FULL access to the above features and ALL future updates. Cancel at anytime. For more information, please see our
